name: DetachBlogAuthorFromLangGroup
description:
Detach a Blog Author from a multi-language group.

Use this tool to remove a blog author from an existing multi-language group in HubSpot CMS. Call this when authors need to be unlinked from specific language variations.

parameters.name: author_id_to_detach
parameters.description: ID of the blog author to remove from a multi-language group in HubSpot CMS.
